name: Kasino Kart
description:
Welcome to the Gamemaster's Kart Kasino! Race against yourself with time trials or test your luck and race against the Gamemaster in Gamemaster's challenge. Choose from 2 different tracks, 2 different modes, and 3 different speeds to test your luck!

After rolling the dice press Space to charge up how far you go

Press Enter once you at your chosen distance and  then hit enter again once the spinner is at the direction you want to go in

Complete two laps to win!

When you drive over a item die, you get a power up. You can only use them before you roll

 Gives you a extra dice when you roll

Adds 3 to the amount you roll (max 6)

 Removes 3 from Gamemaster's distance (Gamemaster's challenge only)

 Skips the Gamemaster's turn (stackable) (Gamemaster's challenge only)

Credit:

Music - RoleMusic, OrigamiRepetik, HoliznaCC0
